body.p: On 1 January 20X1, Entity A designates as the hedged item an amount of CU20 million of assets in the three‑month time period. It designates as the hedged risk the change in the value of the hedged item (ie the CU20 million of assets) that is attributable to changes in LIBOR. It also complies with the other designation requirements set out in paragraphs 88(d) and AG119 of the Standard.
